channel.title: Backlogs on Automation Kit for Power Platform
channel.description: Recent content in Backlogs on Automation Kit for Power Platform

item.title: Process Advisor Integration
item.description: The Automation Kit for Power Platform integrates with Process Advisor to support the following scenarios: Processing Mining Analysis of Business Processes to identify and support the business case to create Automation Projects supported by data analysis. Data Driven Automation Project Requests Use the results of your process analysis to create an Automation Project from Process Advisor results. Semi automated Automation Project creation Integrate Dataverse data between Process Advisor and Automation Kit to reduce the amount of work to create Automation Project.
